TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Label extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 表示控件的文本标签，并提供访问密钥支持。

span.span: Represents the text label for a control and provides support for access keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类支持功能和视觉访问密钥 （也称为助记键）。This class provides both functional and visual support for access keys (also known as mnemonics). 它通常用于启用对控件的快速键盘访问，例如。It is frequently used to enable quick keyboard access to controls such as a . 若要将分配到，将属性设置为在用户按访问密钥时，应获得焦点的控件。To assign a to a , set the property to the control that should get focus when the user presses the access key. 设置目标还原因[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]要用作目标控件的名称的标签文本。Setting the target also causes [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] to use the text of the label as the name of the targeted control. 有关详细信息，请参阅[可访问性](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/index.md)。For more information, see [Accessibility](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/index.md). 若要设置的访问密钥，请添加下划线前应为访问键的字符。To set the access key, add an underscore before the character that should be the access key. 如果内容中有多个下划线字符，只有第一个转换为访问密钥;其他下划线显示为普通文本。If your content has multiple underscore characters, only the first one is converted into an access key; the other underscores appear as normal text. 如果要转换的访问密钥为下划线字符不是第一个下划线，使用两个连续的下划线前加上你想要转换的任何下划线。If the underscore that you want converted to the access key is not the first underscore, use two consecutive underscores for any underscores that precede the one that you want to convert. 例如，下面的代码包含一个访问密钥，并显示**W**orld:For example, the following code contains an access key and displays as _Hello**W**orld: ``` ``` 由于之前 H 下划线是一个双精度值，W 键注册为访问键。Because the underscore that precedes H is a double, the W key registers as the access key. 标签不是可获得焦点，并不是一个制表位。A label is not focusable, and it is not a tab stop. 有关详细信息，请参阅[焦点概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md)。For details, see [Focus Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/focus-overview.md). 一个是，这意味着它可以包含任何类型 （如字符串、 图像或一个面板） 的单个对象。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. ## 自定义标签控件Customizing the Label Control 若要将相同的属性设置应用到多个控件，使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 可以修改默认为控件提供唯一外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的部件和状态的特定于，请参阅[Label 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/label-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Label Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/label-styles-and-templates.md). 该控件的依赖关系属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果属性设置为默认样式，该属性可能会更改从其默认值时该控件将出现在应用程序中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 桌面主题使用应用程序运行时确定的默认样式。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认 WPF 主题](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > Visual 属性设置才会影响该属性是否都存在于控件的默认模板，并使用设置。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 可以在中的"更改可视结构控制"部分中找到的视觉对象属性列表[通过创建 ControlTemplate 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建使用绑定以将目标设置。The following example shows how to create a that uses a binding to set the target. [!code-xaml[LabelSnippet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LabelSnippet/CS/Pane1.xaml#1)] 下面的示例演示如何创建的具有访问键且支持文本换行。The following example shows how to create a that has an access key and supports text wrapping. [!code-xaml[LabelSnippet#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/LabelSnippet/CS/Pane1.xaml#4)]

summary.span: 作为 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 基础结构的一部分，为此控件提供相应的 实现。

summary.span: 获取或设置当用户按下标签的访问键时获得焦点的元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the element that receives focus when the user presses the label's access key.

value.span: 当用户按下访问键时获得焦点的 。

span.span: The that receives focus when the user presses the access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以提供对不支持，从而访问键的元素的键盘快捷方式访问密钥和设置此属性。You can provide keyboard shortcuts to elements that don't support access keys by giving a an access key and setting this property. 通过将下划线用作访问键的字符前面放置到标签分配访问键。Assign an access key to a label by placing an underscore immediately before the character that acts as the access key. 可以在中指定的访问密钥属性或通过设置到对象。An access key can be specified in the property or by setting to an object. 您不能使用此属性定义。You cannot use this property to define a . 例如，以下编译但不能正常工作： ``。For example, the following compiles but is not functional: ``. 此属性提供对已在你的应用程序中定义的元素的引用。This property provides a reference to an element that is already defined in your application. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
